thread.section_title: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance | calcas.com | 4 of 27
thread.title: Jodi Gray
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Jodi Gray

author: Jodi Gray
title: Jodi Gray
text: I have been with California Casualty for many years. I have never had a negative experience. I have both homeowners as well as vehicle insurance. For the times that I have had to file claims I have had positive experiences. I also feel that the rates are superior. I have better coverage on my home than I had with my previous insurance company for a very modest price. I always recommend California Casualty to my family. A few have even switched.
